intro: Justicia insolita subsp. insolita, commonly known as the zigzag plant, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. It belongs to the Acanthaceae family and is characterized by its striking, tubular flowers that range in color from blue to purple. The plant features opposite, lance-shaped leaves with a distinctive zigzag pattern along the midrib. It thrives in well-drained soil and full sun, making it a popular choice for ornamental gardening. Its unique appearance and ability to attract pollinators make it a valuable addition to tropical and subtropical landscapes.
